original: Majjhima Nikāya 149
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Mahāsaḷāyatanikasutta
analyzed: mahā saḷāyatanika sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “mahāsaḷāyatanikaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi.
analyzed: mahā saḷāyatanikam vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi

original: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Cakkhuṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, rūpe ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ,
analyzed: cakkhu bhikkhave ajānam apassam yathābhūta rūpe ajānam apassam yathābhūta

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, cakkhusamphassaṁ ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ,
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam a jānam a passam yathābhūta cakkhu samphassam a jānam a passam yathābhūta

original: yamidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ
analyzed: yam idam cakkhu samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukha

original: vā tampi ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, cakkhusmiṁ sārajjati, rūpesu sārajjati, cakkhuviññāṇe
analyzed: vā tam pi a jānam a passam yathābhūta cakkhusmiṃ sārajjati rūpesu sārajjati cakkhu viññāṇe

original: sārajjati, cakkhusamphasse sārajjati, yamidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ
analyzed: sā ārajjati cakkhu samphasse sā ārajjati yam idam cakkhu samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayita

original: sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi sārajjati.
analyzed: sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tasmim pi sā ārajjati

original: Tassa sārattassa saṁyuttassa sammūḷhassa assādānupassino viharato āyatiṁ pañcupādānakkhandhā upacayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa sārattassa sayuttassa sammūḍhassa assāda anupassinaḥ viharataḥ āyatim pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ upacayam gacchanti

original: Taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, sā cassa pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī sā ca ssa pavaḍḍhati

original: Tassa kāyikāpi darathā pavaḍḍhanti, cetasikāpi darathā pavaḍḍhanti;
analyzed: tassa kāyikā api darathā pavaḍḍhanti cetasikā api darathā pavaḍḍhanti

original: kāyikāpi santāpā pavaḍḍhanti, cetasikāpi santāpā pavaḍḍhanti;
analyzed: kāyikā api santāpā pavaḍḍhanti cetasikā api santāpā pavaḍḍhanti

original: kāyikāpi pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti, cetasikāpi pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti.
analyzed: kāyikā api pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti cetasikā api pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti

original: So kāyadukkhampi cetodukkhampi paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: so kāya dukkham pi cetaḥ dukkham pi paṭisavedeti

original: Sotaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sota bhikkhave ajānam apassam yathābhūtam pe

original: ghānaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ghāna bhikkhave a jānam a passam yathābhūtam pe

original: jivhaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhikkhave a jānam a passam yathābhūtam pe

original: kāyaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: kāya bhikkhave ajānam apassam yathābhūtam pe

original: manaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, dhamme, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ,
analyzed: bhikkhave ajānam apassam yathābhūta dhamme bhikkhave ajānam apassam yathābhūta

original: manoviññāṇaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, manosamphassaṁ, bhikkhave, ajānaṁ
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇa bhikkhave ajānam apassam yathābhūta manaḥ samphassa bhikkhave ajāna

original: apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, yamidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ
analyzed: apassam yathābhūta yam idam manaḥ samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā

original: vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi ajānaṁ apassaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, manasmiṁ sārajjati, dhammesu
analyzed: vā adukkham asukham vā tam pi a jānam a passam yathābhūta manasmim sārajjati dhammesu

original: sārajjati, manoviññāṇe sārajjati, manosamphasse sārajjati, yamidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā
analyzed: sā ārajjati manaḥ viññāṇe sā ārajjati manaḥ samphasse sā ārajjati yam idam manaḥ samphassa paccayā

original: uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi sārajjati.
analyzed: uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tasmim pi sā ārajjati

original: Tassa sārattassa saṁyuttassa sammūḷhassa assādānupassino viharato āyatiṁ pañcupādānakkhandhā upacayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa sārattassa sayuttassa sammūḍhassa assāda anupassinaḥ viharataḥ āyatim pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ upacayam gacchanti

original: Taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, sā cassa pavaḍḍhati.
analyzed: taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī sā ca ssa pavaḍḍhati

original: Tassa kāyikāpi darathā pavaḍḍhanti, cetasikāpi darathā pavaḍḍhanti;
analyzed: tassa kāyikā api darathā pavaḍḍhanti cetasikā api darathā pavaḍḍhanti

original: kāyikāpi santāpā pavaḍḍhanti, cetasikāpi santāpā pavaḍḍhanti;
analyzed: kāyikā api santāpā pavaḍḍhanti cetasikā api santāpā pavaḍḍhanti

original: kāyikāpi pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti, cetasikāpi pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti.
analyzed: kāyikā api pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti cetasikā api pariḷāhā pavaḍḍhanti

original: So kāyadukkhampi cetodukkhampi paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: so kāya dukkham pi cetaḥ dukkham pi paṭisavedeti

original: Cakkhuñca kho, bhikkhave, jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, rūpe jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ,
analyzed: cakkhum ca kho bhikkhave jānam passam yathābhūta rūpe jānam passam yathābhūta

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, cakkhusamphassaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ,
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam jānam passam yathābhūta cakkhu samphassam jānam passam yathābhūta

original: yamidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ
analyzed: yam idam cakkhu samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukha

original: vā tampi jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, cakkhusmiṁ na sārajjati, rūpesu na sārajjati,
analyzed: vā tam pi jānam passam yathābhūta cakkhusmiṃ na sārajjati rūpesu na sārajjati

original: cakkhuviññāṇe na sārajjati, cakkhusamphasse na sārajjati, yamidaṁ cakkhusamphassapaccayā
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇe na sārajjati cakkhu samphasse na sārajjati yam idam cakkhu samphassa paccayā

original: uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi na sārajjati.
analyzed: uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tasmim pi na sārajjati

original: Tassa asārattassa asaṁyuttassa asammūḷhassa ādīnavānupassino viharato āyatiṁ pañcupādānakkhandhā apacayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa a sārattassa a sayuttassa a sammūḍhassa ādīnava anupassinaḥ viharataḥ āyatim pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ apacayam gacchanti

original: Taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, sā cassa pahīyati.
analyzed: taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī sā ca ssa pahīyati

original: Tassa kāyikāpi darathā pahīyanti, cetasikāpi darathā pahīyanti;
analyzed: tassa kāyikā api darathā pahīyanti cetasikā api darathā pahīyanti

original: kāyikāpi santāpā pahīyanti, cetasikāpi santāpā pahīyanti;
analyzed: kāyikāḥ api santāpāḥ pahīyanti cetasikāḥ api santāpāḥ pahīyanti

original: kāyikāpi pariḷāhā pahīyanti, cetasikāpi pariḷāhā pahīyanti.
analyzed: kāyikāḥ api pariḷāhāḥ pahīyanti cetasikāḥ api pariḷāhāḥ pahīyanti

original: So kāyasukhampi cetosukhampi paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: saḥ kāya sukham cetaḥ sukham pi paṭisaveda iti

original: Yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi;
analyzed: yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi sā assa hoti sammādiṭṭhi

original: yo tathābhūtassa saṅkappo svāssa hoti sammāsaṅkappo;
analyzed: yaḥ tathābhūtassa saṅkappo hoti sammāsaṅkappo

original: yo tathābhūtassa vāyāmo svāssa hoti sammāvāyāmo;
analyzed: yaḥ tathābhūtassa vāyāmo hoti sammāvāyāmo

original: yā tathābhūtassa sati sāssa hoti sammāsati;
analyzed: yā tathābhūtassa sati sā assa hoti sammā asati

original: yo tathābhūtassa samādhi svāssa hoti sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: yaḥ tathābhūtassa samādhi hoti sammāsamādhi

original: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hoti.
analyzed: pubbā iva kho panassa kāya kammam vacī kammam ājīvo su parisuddhaḥ hoti

original: Evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: evam assa ayam ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Tassa evaṁ imaṁ ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvayato cattāropi satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ
analyzed: tassa evam imam ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvayataḥ cattāraḥ api sati paṭṭhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūri

original: gacchanti, cattāropi sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, cattāropi iddhipādā
analyzed: gacchanti cattāraḥ api sammappadhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti cattāraḥ api iddhipādā

original: bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcapi indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcapi
analyzed: bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti pañca api indriyāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti pañca api

original: balāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, sattapi bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: balāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti satta pi bojjhaṅgāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Tassime dve dhammā yuganandhā vattanti—
analyzed: tassa ime dve dhammā yuga nandhā vattanti

original: samatho ca vipassanā ca.
analyzed: samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca

original: So ye dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā te dhamme abhiññā parijānāti.
analyzed: so ye dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā te dhamme abhiññā parijānāti

original: Ye dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā te dhamme abhiññā pajahati.
analyzed: ye dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā te dhamme abhiññā pajahati

original: Ye dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā te dhamme abhiññā bhāveti.
analyzed: ye dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā te dhamme abhiññā bhāveti

original: Ye dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā te dhamme abhiññā sacchikaroti.
analyzed: ye dhammāḥ abhiñā sacchikātabbā te dhamme abhiññā sacchikaroti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā

original: ‘Pañcupādānakkhandhā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ,
analyzed: pañca upādānakkhandhā tissa vacanīya

original: seyyathidaṁ—rūpupādānakkhandho, vedanupādānakkhandho, saññupādānakkhandho, saṅkhārupādānakkhandho, viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
analyzed: seyyathidaṃ rūpa upādānakkhandhaḥ vedanupādānakkhandhaḥ saññu pādānakkhandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādānakkhandhaḥ viññāṇupādānakkhandhaḥ

original: Ime dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā.
analyzed: ime dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā

original: Avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca—
analyzed: avijjā ca bhava taṇhā ca

original: ime dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā

original: Samatho ca vipassanā ca—
analyzed: samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca

original: ime dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā.
analyzed: ime dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammāḥ abhiññā sacchikātabbā

original: Vijjā ca vimutti ca—
analyzed: vijjā ca vimutti ca

original: ime dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā.
analyzed: ime dhammāḥ abhiññā sacchikātabbā

original: Sotaṁ, bhikkhave, jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sota bhikkhave jānam passam yathābhūtam pe

original: ghānaṁ bhikkhave, jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: ghānam bhikkhave jānam passam yathābhūtam pe

original: jivhaṁ, bhikkhave, jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: bhikkhave jānam passam yathābhūtam pe

original: kāyaṁ, bhikkhave, jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ …pe…
analyzed: kāya bhikkhave jānam passam yathābhūtam pe

original: manaṁ, bhikkhave, jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, dhamme jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, manoviññāṇaṁ
analyzed: bhikkhave jānam passam yathābhūta dhamme jānam passam yathābhūta manas viññāṇa

original: jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, manosamphassaṁ jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ, yamidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā
analyzed: jānam passam yathābhūta manaḥ samphassam jānam passam yathābhūta yam idam manaḥ samphassa paccayā

original: uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tampi jānaṁ passaṁ yathābhūtaṁ,
analyzed: uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā tam pi jānam passam yathābhūta

original: manasmiṁ na sārajjati, dhammesu na sārajjati, manoviññāṇe na sārajjati, manosamphasse
analyzed: manasmim na sārajjati dhammesu na sārajjati manaḥ viññāṇe na sārajjati manaḥ samphasse

original: na sārajjati, yamidaṁ manosamphassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ
analyzed: na sā ārajjati yam idam manaḥ samphassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkha

original: vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā tasmimpi na sārajjati.
analyzed: vā adukkham asukham vā na sā ārajjati

original: Tassa asārattassa asaṁyuttassa asammūḷhassa ādīnavānupassino viharato āyatiṁ pañcupādānakkhandhā apacayaṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: tassa a sārattassa a sayuttassa a sammūḍhassa ādīnava anupassinaḥ viharataḥ āyatim pañca upādānakkhandhāḥ apacayam gacchanti

original: Taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratatrābhinandinī, sā cassa pahīyati.
analyzed: taṇhā cassa ponobbhavikā nandī rāga sahagatā tatra tatra abhinandinī sā ca ssa pahīyati

original: Tassa kāyikāpi darathā pahīyanti, cetasikāpi darathā pahīyanti;
analyzed: tassa kāyikā api darathā pahīyanti cetasikā api darathā pahīyanti

original: kāyikāpi santāpā pahīyanti, cetasikāpi santāpā pahīyanti;
analyzed: kāyikāḥ api santāpāḥ pahīyanti cetasikāḥ api santāpāḥ pahīyanti

original: kāyikāpi pariḷāhā pahīyanti, cetasikāpi pariḷāhā pahīyanti.
analyzed: kāyikāḥ api pariḷāhāḥ pahīyanti cetasikāḥ api pariḷāhāḥ pahīyanti

original: So kāyasukhampi cetosukhampi paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: saḥ kāya sukham cetaḥ sukham pi paṭisaveda iti

original: Yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhi;
analyzed: yā tathābhūtassa diṭṭhi sā assa hoti sammādiṭṭhi

original: yo tathābhūtassa saṅkappo svāssa hoti sammāsaṅkappo;
analyzed: yaḥ tathābhūtassa saṅkappo hoti sammāsaṅkappo

original: yo tathābhūtassa vāyāmo svāssa hoti sammāvāyāmo;
analyzed: yaḥ tathābhūtassa vāyāmo hoti sammāvāyāmo

original: yā tathābhūtassa sati sāssa hoti sammāsati;
analyzed: yā tathābhūtassa sati sā assa hoti sammā asati

original: yo tathābhūtassa samādhi svāssa hoti sammāsamādhi.
analyzed: yaḥ tathābhūtassa samādhi hoti sammāsamādhi

original: Pubbeva kho panassa kāyakammaṁ vacīkammaṁ ājīvo suparisuddho hoti.
analyzed: pubbā iva kho panassa kāya kammam vacī kammam ājīvo su parisuddhaḥ hoti

original: Evamassāyaṁ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchati.
analyzed: evam assa ayam ariyaḥ aṭṭhaṅgikaḥ maggaḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchati

original: Tassa evaṁ imaṁ ariyaṁ aṭṭhaṅgikaṁ maggaṁ bhāvayato cattāropi satipaṭṭhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ
analyzed: tassa evam imam ariyam aṭṭhaṅgikam maggam bhāvayataḥ cattāraḥ api sati paṭṭhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūri

original: gacchanti, cattāropi sammappadhānā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, cattāropi iddhipādā
analyzed: gacchanti cattāraḥ api sammappadhānāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti cattāraḥ api iddhipādā

original: bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcapi indriyāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, pañcapi
analyzed: bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti pañca api indriyāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti pañca api

original: balāni bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti, sattapi bojjhaṅgā bhāvanāpāripūriṁ gacchanti.
analyzed: balāni bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti satta pi bojjhaṅgāḥ bhāvanā pāripūrim gacchanti

original: Tassime dve dhammā yuganandhā vattanti—
analyzed: tassa ime dve dhammā yuga nandhā vattanti

original: samatho ca vipassanā ca.
analyzed: samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca

original: So ye dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā te dhamme abhiññā parijānāti.
analyzed: so ye dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā te dhamme abhiññā parijānāti

original: Ye dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā te dhamme abhiññā pajahati.
analyzed: ye dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā te dhamme abhiññā pajahati

original: Ye dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā te dhamme abhiññā bhāveti.
analyzed: ye dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā te dhamme abhiññā bhāveti

original: Ye dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā te dhamme abhiññā sacchikaroti.
analyzed: ye dhammāḥ abhiñā sacchikātabbā te dhamme abhiññā sacchikaroti

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā

original: ‘Pañcupādānakkhandhā’ tissa vacanīyaṁ, seyyathidaṁ—
analyzed: pañca upādāna khandhā

original: rūpupādānakkhandho, vedanupādānakkhandho, saññupādānakkhandho, saṅkhārupādānakkhandho, viññāṇupādānakkhandho.
analyzed: rūpa upādāna khandhaḥ vedanā upādāna khandhaḥ saññu pādāna khandhaḥ saṅkhāru pādāna khandhaḥ viññāṇu pādāna khandhaḥ

original: Ime dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā.
analyzed: ime dhammā abhiññā pariññeyyā

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā

original: Avijjā ca bhavataṇhā ca—
analyzed: avijjā ca bhava taṇhā ca

original: ime dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā.
analyzed: ime dhammā abhiññā pahātabbā

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā

original: Samatho ca vipassanā ca—
analyzed: samathaḥ ca vipassanā ca

original: ime dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā.
analyzed: ime dhammā abhiññā bhāvetabbā

original: Katame ca, bhikkhave, dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā?
analyzed: katame ca bhikkhave dhammāḥ abhiññā sacchikātabbā

original: Vijjā ca vimutti ca—
analyzed: vijjā ca vimutti ca

original: ime dhammā abhiññā sacchikātabbā”ti.
analyzed: ime dhammāḥ abhiññā sacchikātabbā ati

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Mahāsaḷāyatanikasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ sattamaṁ.
analyzed: mahā saḷāyatanika suttam niṭṭhitam sattama
